sqlMap.sql:
u.DEL_FLAG = 0
and u.RNVTN_CHECK_NO like '%'||#RNVTN_CHECK_NO#||'%'
and u.CHANN_RNVTN_NO like '%'||#CHANN_RNVTN_NO#||'%'
and u.TERM_NO like '%'||#TERM_NO#||'%'
and u.TERM_NAME like '%'||#TERM_NAME#||'%'
and u.AREA_NAME like '%'||#AREA_NAME#||'%'
and u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME like '%'||#AREA_MANAGE_NAME#||'%'
and u.RNVTN_PROP like '%'||#RNVTN_PROP#||'%'
and u.STATE like '%'||#STATE#||'%'
and u.LEDGER_ID = #LEDGER_ID#
and $QXJBCON$

select u.RNVTN_CHECK_ID, u.RNVTN_CHECK_NO, u.CHANN_RNVTN_NO, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, u.RNVTN_PROP, u.PLAN_SBUSS_DATE, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.LOCAL_TYPE, u.BUSS_SCOPE, u.RNVTN_PRINCIPAL, u.RNVTN_CHECK_DATE, u.STATE from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK u
sqlMap.insert:
insert into DRP_RNVTN_CHECK( RNVTN_CHECK_ID, RNVTN_CHECK_NO, CHANN_RNVTN_NO, RNVTN_PRINCIPAL, RNVTN_CHECK_DATE, TERM_NO, TERM_NAME, RNVTN_PROP, PLAN_SBUSS_DATE,
AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_TEL, SALE_STORE_NAME, ZONE_ADDR, LOCAL_TYPE, BUSS_SCOPE, CHECK_SCORE, STATE, CHECK_REMARK, PUNISH_REMARK, REMARK,
DEL_FLAG, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME,
DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME )values( #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#, #RNVTN_CHECK_NO#, #CHANN_RNVTN_NO#, #RNVTN_PRINCIPAL#, to_date(#RNVTN_CHECK_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD'), #TERM_NO#, #TERM_NAME#, #RNVTN_PROP#, to_date(#PLAN_SBUSS_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD'),
#AREA_NO#, #AREA_NAME#, #AREA_MANAGE_NAME#, #AREA_MANAGE_TEL#, #SALE_STORE_NAME#, #ZONE_ADDR#, #LOCAL_TYPE#, #BUSS_SCOPE#, #CHECK_SCORE#, #STATE#, #CHECK_REMARK#, #PUNISH_REMARK#, #REMARK#,
#DEL_FLAG#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate,
#DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME# )

insert into DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL( RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID, RNVTN_CHECK_ID, PRJ_TYPE, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_SCORE, CHECK_SCORE, CHECK_REMARK, DEL_FLAG, IS_REFORM_FLAG )values( #RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID#, #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#, #PRJ_TYPE#, #PRJ_NAME#, #PRJ_SCORE#, #CHECK_SCORE#, #CHECK_REMARK#, #DEL_FLAG#, #IS_REFORM_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_RNVTN_CHECK
RNVTN_CHECK_NO = #RNVTN_CHECK_NO# RNVTN_PRINCIPAL = #RNVTN_PRINCIPAL# RNVTN_CHECK_DATE = to_date(#RNVTN_CHECK_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') TERM_NO = #TERM_NO# TERM_NAME = #TERM_NAME# RNVTN_PROP = #RNVTN_PROP# PLAN_SBUSS_DATE = to_date(#PLAN_SBUSS_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') AREA_NO = #AREA_NO# AREA_NAME = #AREA_NAME#
AREA_MANAGE_NAME = #AREA_MANAGE_NAME# AREA_MANAGE_TEL = #AREA_MANAGE_TEL# SALE_STORE_NAME = #SALE_STORE_NAME# ZONE_ADDR = #ZONE_ADDR# LOCAL_TYPE = #LOCAL_TYPE# BUSS_SCOPE = #BUSS_SCOPE# CHECK_SCORE = #CHECK_SCORE# STATE = #STATE#
PUNISH_REMARK = #PUNISH_REMARK# CHECK_REMARK = #CHECK_REMARK# REMARK = #REMARK#
where RNVTN_CHECK_ID = #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#
sqlMap.select: select t.RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID, t.RNVTN_CHECK_ID , t.PRJ_TYPE, t.PRJ_NAME, t.PRJ_SCORE, t.CHECK_SCORE, t.CHECK_REMARK, t.IS_REFORM_FLAG from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL t left join DRP_RNVTN_CHECK k on k.RNVTN_CHECK_ID = t.RNVTN_CHECK_ID where t.DEL_FLAG='0' AND t.RNVTN_CHECK_ID = #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#

select t.RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID, t.RNVTN_CHECK_ID , t.PRJ_TYPE, t.PRJ_NAME, t.PRJ_SCORE, t.CHECK_SCORE, t.CHECK_REMARK, t.IS_REFORM_FLAG from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL t left join DRP_RNVTN_CHECK k on k.RNVTN_CHECK_ID = t.RNVTN_CHECK_ID where t.DEL_FLAG='0' AND t.RNVTN_CHECK_ID = #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#

select u.RNVTN_SUBST_STD_ID, u.RNVTN_SUBST_STD_NO, u.BRAND, u.MIN_AREA, u.STD_AREA, u.BUILD_COST, u.DECORATE_COST, u.RNVTN_SUBST_STD_VSION, u.STATE, u.REMARK, u.CREATOR, u.CRE_NAME, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD') CRE_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.REMARK from DRP_RNVTN_SUBST_STD u where u.RNVTN_SUBST_STD_ID = #RNVTN_SUBST_STD_ID#

select b.ATT_ID, b.ATT_PATH, u.RNVTN_CHECK_ID, u.RNVTN_CHECK_NO, u.CHANN_RNVTN_NO, u.RNVTN_PRINCIPAL, u.RNVTN_CHECK_DATE, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, u.RNVTN_PROP, u.PLAN_SBUSS_DATE, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, u.SALE_STORE_NAME, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.LOCAL_TYPE, u.BUSS_SCOPE, u.CHECK_SCORE, u.STATE, u.CHECK_REMARK, u.PUNISH_REMARK, u.REMARK from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK u left join BASE_ATT b on u.RNVTN_CHECK_ID = b.from_bill_id where u.RNVTN_CHECK_ID = #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#
sqlMap.update: update DRP_CHANN_RNVTN set CHANN_RNVTN_ID = #CHANN_RNVTN_ID# where CHANN_RNVTN_ID = #CHANN_RNVTN_ID:VARCHAR#
update DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID in ($RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID$)
update DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID in ($RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID$)
update DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID in ($RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID$)
sqlMap.select: select d.RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID,d.prj_type,d.prj_name,d.prj_score, d.RNVTN_CHECK_ID,d.CHECK_SCORE,d.check_remark,d.IS_REFORM_FLAG from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL d where d.DEL_FLAG=0 and d.RNVTN_CHECK_ID = #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#
select d.rnvtn_check_dtl_id,d.rnvtn_check_id from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL d where d.PRJ_TYPE =#PRJ_TYPE# and d.PRJ_NAME=#PRJ_NAME# and d.del_flag=0 and d.RNVTN_CHECK_ID = #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#
select d.rnvtn_check_dtl_id,d.rnvtn_check_id from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL d where d.rnvtn_check_id = #RNVTN_CHECK_ID#

select u.rnvtn_check_dtl_id, u.rnvtn_check_id, u.prj_type, u.prj_name, u.prj_score, u.check_score, u.check_remark, u.del_flag, u.is_reform_flag from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL u where u.rnvtn_check_dtl_id in ($rnvtn_check_dtl_id$)

select c.rnvtn_check_id,c.rnvtn_check_no,c.chann_rnvtn_id,c.chann_rnvtn_no, c.rnvtn_principal,c.rnvtn_check_date ,c.term_id,c.term_no,c.term_name,c.rnvtn_prop, c.plan_sbuss_date,c.sale_store_id,c.sale_store_name,c.local_type,c.buss_scope,c.spcl_store_type ,c.state from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK c where c.RNVTN_CHECK_ID in ('$RNVTN_CHECK_ID$')

select t.RNVTN_CHECK_ID , t.RNVTN_CHECK_DTL_ID, t.PRJ_TYPE, t.PRJ_NAME, t.PRJ_SCORE, t.CHECK_SCORE, t.CHECK_REMARK, t.IS_REFORM_FLAG from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK_DTL t left join DRP_RNVTN_CHECK d on t.rnvtn_check_id = d.RNVTN_CHECK_ID where t.RNVTN_CHECK_ID in ('$RNVTN_CHECK_ID$')

select count(u.CHANN_RNVTN_ID) from DRP_CHANN_RNVTN u where u.CHANN_RNVTN_ID=#CHANN_RNVTN_ID#
u.CHANN_NAME != #CHANN_NAME#
